summary: Most core functionality for a single-page pink Valentine proposal (Yes-only interaction), success celebration, and backend persistence/query is implemented. The main gap is the absence of the required generated image asset files under the specified public path (only references exist). Some unrequested additions include wiring in Internet Identity provider/auth infrastructure and a branded footer link.

missing_requirements.requirement: Generated images are placed under frontend/public/assets/generated and are referenced directly by the frontend.
missing_requirements.reason: The frontend references the generated images via /assets/generated/... but the diff summary does not show the actual image files being added under frontend/public/assets/generated.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication/provider wiring added to the app bootstrap and actor creation logic.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly says auth is not required; adding an auth provider and identity-based actor recreation is extra scope beyond persistence requirements.
evidence: frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts (uses identity to create actor with agentOptions.identity)

hallucinated_features.description: Added a branded footer with an external link to caffeine.ai.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by any requirement; introduces additional external link/content.
